content: अभि {%<ab>ind.</ab>%} {@--1@} (As a prefix to verbs and nouns) It means ({%a%}) ‘to’, ‘towards’, ‘in the direction of’; अभिगम् go towards, अभिया, °गमनं, °यानं &c.; ({%b%}) ‘for’, ‘against’; °लष्, °पत् &c.; ({%c%}) ‘on’, ‘upon’; °सिंच् to sprinkle on &c.; ({%d%}), ‘over’, ‘above’, ‘across’; °भू to overpower, °तन्; ({%e%}) ‘greatly’; ‘excessively’ °कंप्. {@--2@} (As a prefix to nouns not derived from verbs, and to adjectives) It expresses ({%a%}) intensity or superiority; °धर्मः ‘supreme duty’; °ताम्र ‘very red, °नव ‘very new’; ({%b%}) ‘towards,’ ‘in the direction of,’ forming <ab>adv.</ab> compounds; °चैद्यं, °मुखं, °दूति &c. {@--3@} (As a separable adverb) It means towards, in the direction or vicinity of (<ab>opp.</ab> अप); in, above, aloft, on the top, (mostly Ved). {@--4@} (As a preposition with <ab>acc.</ab>) ({%a%}) To, towards, in the direction of, against; (with <ab>acc.</ab> or in <ab>comp.</ab> in this sense); अभ्याग्नि or अग्निमभि शलभाः पतंति; वृक्षमभि द्योतते विद्युत् <ls>Sk.</ls>; <ls>Śi. 9. 56</ls>, <ls n="Śi.">7. 40</ls>; अभ्यर्कबिंबं स्थितः <ls>Ś. 7. 11.</ls> ({%b%}) Near, before, in front or presence of; <ls>Śi. 7. 32</ls>; <ls n="Śi.">15. 58.</ls> ({%c%}) On, upon, with regard or reference to; सायमंडनमभि त्वरयंत्यः <ls>Ki. 9. 6</ls>; साधुर्देवदत्तो मातरमभि <ls>Sk.</ls> ({%d%}) Severally, one after another (in a distributive sense); वृक्षं वृक्षमभि सिंचति <ls>Sk.</ls>; भूतभूतमभि प्रभुः <ls>Bop.</ls> By <ls>P. I. 4. 91</ls> अभि has all the senses of अनु given in <ls n="P.">I. 4. 90</ls> except that of भाग; {%<ab>e. g.</ab>%} (लक्षणे) हरिमभि वर्तते; ( इत्थंभूताख्याने) भक्तो हरिमभि; (वीप्सायां), देवं देवमभि सिंचति; but यदत्र ममाभिष्यात् तद्दीयतां; प्राज्ञो गोविंदमभितिष्ठति <ls>Bop.</ls> ({%e%}) In, into, to; <ls>Śi. 8. 60.</ls> ({%f%}) For, for the sake of, on account of (<ab>Ved.</ab>). According to <ls>G. M.</ls> अभि has these senses: --अभि , पूजाभृशार्थेच्छासौम्याभिमुख्यसौरूप्यवचनाहारस्वाध्यायेषु; {%<ab>e. g.</ab>%} पूजायां, अभिवंदते; भृशे, अभिनिवेशः; इच्छायां, अभिलाषः, अभिकः; सौम्ये or माधुर्ये, अभिजातः; आभिमुख्ये, अभिमुखं, अभ्यग्नि; सौरूप्ये, अभिरूपं; वचने, अभिधत्ते; आहारे, अभ्यवहरति; स्वाध्याये, अभ्यस्याति. [<ab>cf.</ab> <ab>L.</ab> {%ob%}; <ab>Gr.</ab> {%amphi%}; Zend {%aibi%} or {%aiwi%}, <ab>Goth.</ab> {%bi%}; also {%umbi%}; {%um%}].
